gmd:metadataStandardName.gco:CharacterString: ISO 19139 Geographic Information - Metadata - Implementation Specification

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: DC Reservations THIS IS A GENERAL LAYER FOR REFERENCE. FOR MORE TIMELY AND ACCURATE INFORMATION) or remain under Federal jurisdiction (managed by NPS). This dataset is a consolidated collection of all known DC Reservations. The primary data source for this dataset is the Reservations List Spatial data came from a variety of sources This dataset should be considered DRAFT and is a work in progress. All DC GIS data is stored and exported in Maryland State Plane coordinates NAD 83 meters. METADATA CONTENT IS IN PROCESS OF VALIDATION AND SUBJECT TO CHANGE.

gmd:purpose.gco:CharacterString: This data is used for the planning and management of Washington by local government agencies.

gmd:keyword.gco:CharacterString: Washington, District of Columbia, United States

gmd:useLimitation.gco:CharacterString: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License.

Acknowledgment of the DC Geographic Information Systems Program (DC GIS). The District of Columbia Government makes no claims as to the completeness, accuracy or content of any data contained hereon, and makes no representation of any kind, including, but not limited to, the warranty of the accuracy or fitness for a particular use, nor are any such warranties to be implied or inferred with respect to the information or data furnished herein.

gmd:measureDescription.gco:CharacterString: Data believed to be complete and accurate, subject to change.
Data believed to be complete and accurate, subject to change. Digital version compared with original source data for accuracy and completeness. Validated by source and/or responsible agency.
Data believed to be complete and accurate, subject to change. Digital version compared with original source data for accuracy and completeness. Validated by source and/or responsible agency.
Data believed to be complete and accurate, subject to change.

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: Perform validation between existing spatial image datasets and NPS location descriptions: NPS Map-A 09/26/2001 from NPS Tax Map Scans 06/21/2001 from DCGIS/RPTA Incorporate spatial data for MERGE: Property Squares 03/29/2004 from DCGIS/RPTA Road Boundaries 03/31/2001 from DCGIS/NCPC Hand-digitize boundaries where necessary.

Perform spatial MERGE: Property Squares 03/29/2004 from DCGIS/RPTA Road Boundaries 03/31/2001 from DCGIS/NCPC Reservations 09/01/2004 from DCOP Perform cleanup of data content and fields. Rename Reservation dataset from [ResBaist1959] to [Reservations]

Perform validation between existing spatial image datasets and NPS location descriptions: Public Reservations 06/30/1894 from HP Incorporate spatial data for MERGE: Property Squares 03/29/2004 from DCGIS/RPTA Road Boundaries 03/31/2001 from DCGIS/NCPC Hand-digitize boundaries where necessary.

Removed and renamed many field names, removing those fields associated with the validation of the dataset agains historic data sources. Also moved some fields to enable easier reading of attribute data. Field changed include: RESERV Renamed to RESNO COMBINEWITH >>Dropped BAISTCHK >>Dropped SOURCE Moved to last fieldname UPDATE_TYP >>Dropped UPDATE_TXT >>Dropped NOTES Moved to end of fields NPSTXTERR Moved to end of fields PARKNAME ALTNAME APPROP1792 >>Dropped NAME1792 >>Dropped RESERVE1894 >>Dropped STREET1894 >>Dropped CHKRESCHG >>Dropped TXTRESCHG >>Dropped RESERVEORIG >>Dropped RESNO_INT Moved to beginning of fields BAISTVALUE >>Dropped NPSRESTEXT Renamed to NPSTEXT ALPHACODE RESNAME NPSLOCATION PRIMESTREET TRANSDATE TRANSTO Changed to TRANS_TO DESCRIPTION MANAGEDBY >>Dropped HOWACQUIRED NPSSQRFT NPSACRES

Located NPS Parks datasets containing Public Reservation numbers: ParkPly 02/14/2002 from DCGIS / NPS (Fine Linework) NpsParks_Dc10_03 10/03/2003 from NPS (Fine Linework) NewDcBndsVer4 03/23/2000 from NPS (NPS Map-A) (Coarse Linework) Extracted polygons containing Reservation Numbers. Restructured fieldnames and sizes to be consistent between source datasets. Included original field contents for Reservation Numbers / Locations.

Obtained new and updated park-related data sets: ncrparks_dc1_9 01/09/2004 from NPS All_DPR_Polys_2_9 02/09/2004 from DPR PropSqrPly 03/29/2004 from DCGIS/RPTA Restructured fieldnames and sizes to be consistent between 1st Edition consolidated Reservations [ResBaist1959] and new source datasets. Transfer related field values from 1st Edition Reservations into restructured datasets (incorporate updated linework into dataset). Identify and include additional Reservations from [PropSqrPly] dataset. Identify / track potential problems.

Generated validation maps for comparison between consolidated Reservations dataset (NpsResFull) and hardcopy Baist Real Estate Atlas (Copyright 1959). Added validation-related fields to [NpsResFull] to track changes, errors, and inconsistencies between the merged Reservations and the hardcopy Baist maps. Performed visual validation between [NpsResFull] dataset and Baist Map volumes. Updated validation fields accordingly. In the validations, several issues were identified: > Reservation Number different > New spatial records needed > Reservation not present on Baist map > Sliver polygons at park boundaries > Polygons in unexpected size or shape > Missing Reservations > Other problems

Transfer text descriptions from Reservation List document into corresponding Reservation Number records in Reservation dataset. Populate primary and secondary Reservation text fields. Populate NPS text error fields as necessary. Identify missing records in Reservation List document for future digitization.
Merged the new Reservation data sources (ncrparks_dc1_9, All_DPR_Polys_2_9, PropSqrPly) with the consolidated dataset (ResBaist1959).
Merged the reformatted and extracted Reservation data sources into a preliminary consolidated dataset.

Obtain current Reservations document (Reservations List (2002)) from National Park Service. Add new fields to Reservation dataset to capture original text descriptions. These include: [AlphaCode] Original Park Code from "Park" column [NpsResText] Original Text Description from "Location" column [HowAcquired] Original value from "How Acquired" column [NpsSqrFt] Original value from "Square Feet" column [NpsAcres] Original value from "Acres" column Add new fields to capture parsed data from [NpsResText] field. These include: [ResName] Reservation Name (first value in [NpsResText]) [TransTo] Transferred to (second value in [NpsResText]) [TransDate] Transfer Date (third value in [NpsResText]) [NpsLocation] Location/Address Description (fourth value in [NpsResText]) [PrimeStreet] Initial/Primary street used in [NpsLocation] [ParkName] Park Name (when not Triangle, Circle, etc) [AltName] Alternate Park Name Add new fields to capture typographical problems in Reservation List document. These fields include: [NpsTxtErr] NPS Text Error
Submitted 1st Edition Consolidated Reservations dataset to National Park Service (NPS) for review. Dataset name changed from [NpsResFull] to [ResBaist1959] to reflect primary validation reference.

Identify sliver or overlapping polygons between adjacent Reservation boundaries. Remove overlapping polygons. Match adjacent Reservations to common boundaries. Identify within dataset adjacent / overlapping Reservations (for future editing)

Obtain current Historic Map (Public Reservations - 1894) from DC Historic Preservation (HP) Add new fields to Reservation dataset to capture 1894 Reservations & Locations. These include: [Reserve1894] 1894 Reservation Number [Street1894] 1894 Primary Street

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: District of Columbia Inventory of Historic Sites

gmd:alternateTitle.gco:CharacterString: District of Columbia Inventory of Historic Sites

gmd:maintenanceNote.gco:CharacterString: Metadata was created as or translated to ISO 19139 for inclusion in the Big Ten Academic Alliance Geoportal.

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: Big Ten Academic Alliance Geospatial Data Project
